goverment.name: Monarchy
goverment.title: King
goverment.info:
Monarchy is very advanced form of Despotism. In monarchy the ruler - king is elected by his blood rather than power.
Farms under monarchy produce one gold more, but are 2 gold more expensive to build.

goverment.name: Republic
goverment.title: Consul
goverment.info:
Republic or Classical Republic is a form of organised goverment, where elected people hold power. In republic it is usually a group of people - a Senate or similar.
Republic gives you one gold discount on all upgrades building, but switching technologies under Republic costs an action.

goverment.name: Communism
goverment.title: Chairman
goverment.info:
Communism is a totalitarian goverment which gives power to the masses. In communist state economy is planed and all control is given to one party.
Under communism maintenace of all your upgrades will cost 50% less gold, but building any upgrade will cost one gold more.

goverment.name: Dictatorship
goverment.title: General
goverment.info:
Dictatorship or Junta is highly militarized goverment. In dictatorship the army holds power and controls the state.
Under dictatorship maintenance of your army will cost 25% gold less, but also your research funds will be 20% less effective.

goverment.name: Despotism
goverment.title: Despot
goverment.info:
Despotism is an early form of monarchy where one individual hold all power. Despotic goverments are usually built on power - the strongest individual rules.
Despotism allows to build units one gold cheaper, but when you revolt to new goverment your gold will be zeroed.

goverment.name: Theocracy
goverment.title: God-King
goverment.info:
Theocracy is advanced form of Despotism. In theocratic goverment ruler is identified as religious leader. Usually by stating that he/she is a god-son or sometimes that ruler is god himself.
Theocracy gives 10 gold discount on city building, but cities cost additional 2 gold maintenance.

goverment.name: Democracy
goverment.title: President
goverment.info:
Democracy is modern version of classical republic. Democratic goverment is highly legalized form of goverment which tries to give as much decision power to people, while protecting their laws and freedom.
Under democracy economic effect of roads will be doubled, but maintenance of your army will cost 25% more gold.

goverment.name: Fundamentalism
goverment.title: Holy Leader
goverment.info:
Fundamentalism is a modern version of Theocracy. Usually modern fundamentalists don't create new religions and their rulers don't describe themselves as gods, but rather prophets.
Under fundamentalism recruiting a unit does not cost an action, but your units will be weaker in combat.
